t:
I defeated the four horsemen, crossed the black forest and slayed the Ender dragon to finally reach the abandoned fortress. There behind the locked doors was princess Leia, in her semi-eternal sleep, waiting to be woken up by her true love's kiss.

I held her in my arms, our lips inches away, excited because now I held the prize which so many valiant warriors have died trying to achieve. As our lips touched, I felt my arms weaken, and a strange fear settled in my heart.


Drifting off to sleep beside the princess, I realized that the horsemen, the forest and the dragon wasn't meant to keep the world away from the princess. They're there to keep the princess's curse away from the world.
c:
Eons later another warrior came after defeating the horsemen and crossing the forest. But I couldn't let him reach the princess, she was my prize. I growled, breathing fire out of my mouth.



#princess #sleep #wakeup #truelove #kiss #curse #warrior #lost
